EmailTemplate.name: Sanity check failure
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.CaseNumber} DOCUMENTS REJECTED - {!Account.Name}: {!Account.IATACode__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
IATA Numeric code: {!Account.IATACode__c}
Dear {!Account.Name},
Following the upload and submission of your financial documents to IATA, we have been advised that below documents are invalid, incomplete, or missing:
- <INPUT THE REASON FOR SANITY CHECK FAILURE, AS PROVIDED BY THE GFA>
A complete set of valid financial documents must be uploaded and submitted on the IATA Financial Assessment Portal:
http://www.iata.org/ifap
Your Username and password for the Portal remain as previously communicated.
Deadline for submission: <INPUT THE SAME DEADLINE DATE AS PER THE IFAP CASE>
Please be reminded that a failure to submit your financial documents by <INPUT DEADLINE DATE> will mean that your Agency no longer satisfied the financial standards as published in the Travel/Cargo Agent Handbook, and actions will be taken in accordance with the applicable resolution.
For any queries on this matter, please contact us at http://www.iata.org/cs and refer to your case number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Thank you for your cooperation.
Sincerely, IATA Operations & Service Center
